Description: Last Name/Organization Name of the Provider
The number of Medicare Part D drug claims, including original prescriptions and refills.

The number of Medicare Part D opioid drug claims, including original prescriptions and refills. For a list of drugs that include opioids, visit https://www.cms.gov/Research-Statistics-Data-and-Systems/Statistics-Trends-and-Reports/Medicare-Provider-Charge-Data/Downloads/PartD_DrugCatList_2014.zip.
The number of Opioid Claims divided by the Overall Claims and multiplied by 100.
